list.abs: all the lovely Tibetan villagers conveyed me a kind of goodness.Driving slowly alone , I walked to Tibet again when I saw the drawbridge on Jinsha river .可爱的藏族老乡，都在向我传递着一份善意。个人慢慢开着，看到金沙江上面这吊桥以后，自己又走到西藏去转悠了一圈。

entry.def: A drawbridge is a bridge that can be pulled up, for example to prevent people from getting into a castle or to allow ships to pass underneath it.

means.word_mean: 1. a bridge that can be raised to block passage or to allow boats or ships to pass beneath it
